entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 then light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 18.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then south 30 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
